hopobject.name: 2009-08-05-picoflamingo-wins-zoom-ii-for-work-in
hopobject.http_browser: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_8_4) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/28.0.1500.71 Safari/537.36
hopobject.body:
PicoFlamingo wins a Zoom-II for work in the BeagleBoard.org Sponsored Projects Program

Futuristic and innovative ideas pay off in the form of a sweet device! Congrats to the PicoFlamingo team for thinking outside of the box with their BeagleBoard-based portable presentation system and winning a monthly prize in the Sponsored Projects Program for their excellent progress. They have been awarded the OMAP 3 based Zoom II Mobile Development Platform to help pioneer more of their inventions and can’t wait to see what they do to improve their Pink Egg.

Don’t miss out on the opportunity to win a BeagleBoard and/or one of the monthly prizes – visit beagleboard.org/contest to learn how to submit ideas and keep the mailing list and your RSS feed up-to-date with your progress.
